website_summaries.verdict: New design that reimagines John Lennon cool.
pros: Light, unisex style that makes a statement
Available as a straight optic version
Like all Ray-Bans, can be fitted with prescription lenses
cons: Not available in a polarized version

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Ray-Ban
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Matte silver frame and lightly mirrored round lenses. By lightly mirrored I mean you can see my eyes through the lens in bright light. The lenses are larger than John Lennon glasses, but smaller than Ray-ban’s round tortoise shell sunglasses (RB2180). I’ve had many Ray-Ban frames and the glasses, case, and the box they came in are absolutely authentic. I appreciated the glasses accessory kit that was enclosed :)
customer_reviews.author: lorisan5

customer_reviews.title: New favorites
customer_reviews.text: I stayed away from glasses with those nose pads for decades because they dug into my nose. These glasses are light enough that they don’t do that. I can wear them all day, and love it. I bought the cable temples and didn’t like them. These glasses stay put very well with the regular ones. Face down, they stay put. Perfect flying glasses.
customer_reviews.author: chris larson

customer_reviews.title: Its ok!
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty but i had ordered polarized. I received glass which is not polarized. So am returning. Also, i did not receive any kit as per description.
customer_reviews.author: Riya

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully Round
customer_reviews.text: These aren't my first pair of RayBans. They're my very first round frames through and I'm very pleased with them. I think the size is just right for the shape of my face. Altogether a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MERLE

customer_reviews.title: A little scratched
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I ordered had a scratch on the lenses so I ordered another one
customer_reviews.author: Mel’s fam

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking. I'm hard on glasses and the lens has resisted scratching after dropping when I thought scratching would be certain.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: I love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: While I wear a pair of Aviators for when I want to maintain a "classic" look, I love to wear these round lens pair for when I want to project a funky/fun vibe. I still get the great Ray-Ban fit and polarized lens protection.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sunglasses I use it to protect my eyes from sun rays and also as fashion accessory. They also fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Olayinka

customer_reviews.title: 47 mm is kid sized
customer_reviews.text: The part that hooks onto your ear is very short.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love the look of these shades! Will be putting my prescription in them!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fun sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I have had these type of Ray Ban sunglasses for yrs. They fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Clark

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The problem was glasses is not for my size that’s why I just want to send you back
customer_reviews.author: Yasir mushtaq

customer_reviews.title: 😎
customer_reviews.text: I wear them everyday came without a scratch on them!
customer_reviews.author: Lathan dennis

product_meta.title: Ray Ban RB3447 Round Metal Sunglasses
feature_bullets: 💥Kit of 2 Items - Includes AUTHENTIC Ray Ban RB3447 ROUND METAL Sunglasses and FREE eyewear care kit
💥GREAT VALUE- FREE CLEANING KIT. Includes: a Designer iWear 1 ounce spray bottle, mirror, screw driver/key chain, and a folded microfiber cloth.
💥2 YEAR WARRANTY: Includes Manufacturer Warranty, cleaning cloth and case.
